sentence.english: The picture isn't hanging above the sofa anymore.
sentence.spanish: El cuadro ya no cuelga encima del sofá.

sentence.english: Are you standing behind me in the queue?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás detrás de mí en la cola?

sentence.english: She was sitting between her two brothers.
sentence.spanish: Ella estaba sentada entre sus dos hermanos.

sentence.english: He isn't in his office at the moment.
sentence.spanish: Él no está en su oficina en este momento.

sentence.english: Were they waiting in front of the cinema?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estaban esperando delante del cine?

sentence.english: She is placing the lamp in the corner of the room.
sentence.spanish: Ella está colocando la lámpara en la esquina de la habitación.

sentence.english: I wasn't standing in the middle of the road.
sentence.spanish: Yo no estaba parado en medio de la carretera.

sentence.english: Are you sitting next to the window?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás sentado junto a la ventana?

sentence.english: He always parks on the left of the building.
sentence.spanish: Él siempre aparca a la izquierda del edificio.

sentence.english: The book wasn't on the table when I left.
sentence.spanish: El libro no estaba sobre la mesa cuando me fui.

sentence.english: She is looking under the bed for her shoes.
sentence.spanish: Ella está buscando debajo de la cama sus zapatos.

sentence.english: Are they building a bridge over the river?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están construyendo un puente sobre el río?

sentence.english: He wasn't standing on top of the mountain alone.
sentence.spanish: Él no estaba parado encima de la montaña solo.

sentence.english: The planes aren't flying overhead today.
sentence.spanish: Los aviones no vuelan por encima hoy.

sentence.english: Were you sitting at the back of the classroom?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estabas sentado al fondo del aula?

sentence.english: He is walking to the rear of the building.
sentence.spanish: Él está caminando hacia la parte trasera del edificio.

sentence.english: She wasn't following the instructions properly.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estaba siguiendo las instrucciones correctamente.

sentence.english: Are you sitting in between your parents?
sentence.spanish: ¿Estás sentado entre tus padres?

sentence.english: He remained calm amid the chaos.
sentence.spanish: Él permaneció tranquilo en medio del caos.

sentence.english: She wasn't comfortable among strangers.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estaba cómoda entre desconocidos.

sentence.english: Are they waiting inside the building?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están esperando dentro del edificio?

sentence.english: He completed the task within the deadline.
sentence.spanish: Él completó la tarea dentro del plazo.

sentence.english: We aren't staying indoors all day.
sentence.spanish: No nos quedamos dentro de casa todo el día.

sentence.english: She was running ahead of the other competitors.
sentence.spanish: Ella corría delante de los otros competidores.

sentence.english: Are you arriving before the meeting starts?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llegas antes de que empiece la reunión?

sentence.english: He wasn't facing the audience during his speech.
sentence.spanish: Él no estaba enfrente del público durante su discurso.

sentence.english: They are meeting at the corner of the street.
sentence.spanish: Se están reuniendo en la esquina de la calle.

sentence.english: Is the shop on the corner still open?
sentence.spanish: ¿La tienda en la esquina sigue abierta?

spanish: A la vuelta de la esquina

sentence.english: He lives just around the corner from here.
sentence.spanish: Él vive justo a la vuelta de la esquina de aquí.

sentence.english: She wasn't standing at the center of the circle.
sentence.spanish: Ella no estaba parada en el centro del círculo.

sentence.english: Are they placing the statue in the center of the square?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están colocando la estatua en el centro de la plaza?

sentence.english: He was surrounded by his friends at the party.
sentence.spanish: Él estaba rodeado de sus amigos en la fiesta.

sentence.english: She isn't sitting beside her sister today.
sentence.spanish: Ella no está sentada al lado de su hermana hoy.

sentence.english: Are they working alongside the experienced team?
sentence.spanish: ¿Están trabajando a lo largo del equipo experimentado?

sentence.english: His office wasn't adjacent to the main hall.
sentence.spanish: Su oficina no era contigua al salón principal.

sentence.english: He is standing by the window.
sentence.spanish: Él está parado junto a la ventana.

sentence.english: Are you turning to the left at the next junction?
sentence.spanish: ¿Giras a la izquierda en el próximo cruce?

sentence.english: She wasn't driving on the left-hand side of the road.
sentence.spanish: Ella no conducía en el lado izquierdo de la carretera.

sentence.english: The car is moving leftward slowly.
sentence.spanish: El coche se mueve lentamente hacia la izquierda.

sentence.english: Are they shifting rightward in their political views?
sentence.spanish: ¿Se están desplazando hacia la derecha en sus opiniones políticas?

sentence.english: The temperature wasn't below freezing last night.
sentence.spanish: La temperatura no estuvo debajo de cero anoche.

sentence.english: He found his keys beneath the newspaper.
sentence.spanish: Él encontró sus llaves debajo del periódico.

sentence.english: She is hiding underneath the blanket.
sentence.spanish: Ella se esconde debajo de la manta.

sentence.english: Are they arriving after the ceremony?
sentence.spanish: ¿Llegan después de la ceremonia?
